definition: (at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Can I get you your drink while you are making your selection?
sentences.chinese: 在您點餐的時候，我可以幫你拿杯飲料嗎？

sentences.english: Order a coke with a meal only if determined to upset the waiter.
sentences.chinese: 除非你想令侍應生不快，否則點餐時別配以可樂。

sentences.english: But only 11% of kids meals are ordered with apples instead of fries.
sentences.chinese: 但是隻有11%用蘋果替代薯條的兒童餐是被點餐的。

sentences.english: The waitress showed us the menu and asked us to order.
sentences.chinese: 那位女侍給我們看菜單並請我們點餐。

sentences.english: A waiter came at once to take her order.
sentences.chinese: 一位侍應立刻過來爲她點餐。

sentences.english: Jemma and Andy order dinner from a Chinese take-out restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 珍瑪和安迪在一家中國外賣餐館點餐。

sentences.english: The best way to taste a truffle is to order it from a menu.
sentences.chinese: 品嚐塊菌最好的方法是從餐廳的菜單裏點餐。

sentences.english: Do you know how to order a meal in a resturant?
sentences.chinese: 你知道在餐廳怎麼點餐嗎？

sentences.english: Let's say you're at a restaurant and you've been waiting.
sentences.chinese: 假設你在一個餐廳等候點餐。

sentences.english: Every time I go out to eat I always order cold, and hot dishes together.
sentences.chinese: 每次出去喫飯的時候，我總是冷碟熱菜搭配着點餐。

sentences.english: Illustrated photos make it fairly easy to work around the Chinese-only menu and still order well.
sentences.chinese: 中文菜單上還附有食物照片，讓你點餐更加容易。

sentences.english: Clare picks up her purse and I shake my head ather.
sentences.chinese: 克萊爾拿起她的包，我示意不再點餐，然後結了帳。

definition: to reserve a seat/to book a table/reservation
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
to eat in (at a restaurant) (Tw)/to take the medicine orally
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
number plate/car license plate/CL:條|条[tiao2],塊|块[kuai4],片[pian4]
